'''Joseph Mawle''' (born 21 March 1974) is a British actor, best known for his portrayal of [[wikipedia:Jesus Christ|Jesus]] in ''[[wikipedia:The Passion (TV serial)|The Passion]]''. He has appeared in the television series ''[[wikipedia:Red Riding|Red Riding]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Merlin (TV series)|Merlin]]''. In 2012 he appeared in the BBC adaptation of ''[[wikipedia:Birdsong (TV serial)|Birdsong]]'' as World War I sapper Jack Firebrace, and in 2013 he appeared as DI Jebediah Shine in ''[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ripper_Street Ripper Street]''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' Mawle is playing the role of [[Benjen Stark]]. He was confirmed in the role on 20 October 2009.
